front.title: Cisco Systems' Solution for Multicast in MPLS/BGP IP VPNs

abstract.t: This draft describes the MVPN (Multicast in BGP/MPLS IP VPNs) solution designed and deployed by Cisco Systems. The procedures specified in this draft are largely a subset of the generalized MVPN framework recently standardized by the IETF. However, as the deployment of the procedures specified herein pre-dates the publication of IETF standards (in some cases by over five years), an implementation based on these procedures differs in some respects from a fully standards-compliant implementation. These differences are pointed out in the document.
